desc.en: CMake is a tool to manage building of source code. Originally, CMake was designed as a generator for various dialects of Makefile, today CMake generates modern buildsystems such as Ninja as well as project files for IDEs such as Visual Studio and Xcode.
desc.cn: CMake是一种管理源代码构建的工具。最初，CMake被设计为各种Makefile方言的生成器，如今CMake生成现代构建系统，比如Ninja，以及用于诸如Visual Studio和Xcode等集成开发环境的项目文件。
